WorkItem.Description:
As per this post http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=72228, I optimized, as suggested (100 avoidance + block with a boss level of 83).  Results were provided.  I change my character in game and I get a 99.93% total avoidance.
 
Changing the boss level to 80, rawr and my in game stats do not match.
 
I suspect I'm selecting something incorrectly.  Can someone shed some light?
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] Trying to attain 102.4% avoidance + block using optimizer

Comments.Message: Rawr is averaging the Libram of Defiance into your stats.  Since it is not "on use", the trinket handling drop down has no effect on it.
